entries.journal_entry_description: Survive Wirartu's challenges and become the Arena Champion.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Survive the Arena Challenge! If you fall, you fail the challenge even if you have allies that still stand. This is your challenge to win or lose.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Your first challenge is being prepared.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Your second challenge is being prepared and will arrive once this timer is finished.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Your third challenge is being prepared and will arrive once this timer is finished.
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: After this timer expire, you will face Wirartu himself!
entries.task13_journal_entry_description: You have conquered the arena challenge! Talk to Wirartu.
